title: Ep241 Cheese Crimes
description:
This week, the gals cheese out over some delicious deviations. Topics include Italian spun paste (better than it sounds), an intricate case of bootlegged Parm, and the earthy roots of your favorite "fancy" garnish. Pick up a sixer of Leinenkugel's, slam some Lactaid, and tune in for Cheese Crimes.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit https://wineandcrimepodcast.com/sponsors/
